title: The romance of greeting cards; an historical account of the origin, evolution, and development of Christmas card, valentine, and other forms of engraved or printed greetings from the earliest days to the present time By Ernest Dudley Chase, with an introduction by Harry W. author: Chase, Ernest Dudley.
